name: pse-platform-data-bridge
description: Cross-system data integration Lambda for PSE Platform and Content-AI

scripts.deploy: npm run package && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name pse-platform-data-bridge --zip-file fileb://function.zip --region eu-west-2
scripts.create-function: aws lambda create-function --function-name pse-platform-data-bridge --runtime nodejs20.x --role arn:aws:iam::329599649426:role/pse-platform-lambda-role --handler index.handler --timeout 60 --memory-size 512 --region eu-west-2

author: PSE Platform Team
